trait.name: Dwarven Resilience
entries: The axe of mirabar soldier has advantage on saving throws against poison, and has resistance against poison damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The soldier makes two battleaxe attacks. If it has a handaxe drawn, it can also make a handaxe attack.

action.name: Battleaxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage, or 8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) slashing damage if used with two hands.

action.name: Handaxe
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Heavy Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 3} to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d10 + 1}) piercing damage.
